alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 8:08AM CDT until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Camden affecting Ouachita and Calhoun Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Camden. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 32.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecast 7 AM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Crest Time Date Ouachita River Camden 26.0 7.9 Tue 7 AM 12.1 21.2 29.7 32.0 7 AM 3/26 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
